blogPost.excerpt: Let's build an alternative option for the traditional career & city life. One closer connected to nature, yourself and others. Discover 30+ places around the world where you can live, work and surf with like-minded remote workers. Cuz life is now. Pier🌺️
blogPost.body: Let's build an alternative option for the traditional career & city life. One closer connected to nature, yourself and others. Discover 30+ places around the world where you can live, work and surf with like-minded remote workers. Cuz life is now. Pier🌺️
blogPost.title: Coworksurf - Coliving spaces and 👩‍💻  communities next to the surf 🌊
blogPost.author: Pier 🍉

localize.description: 让我们为传统的职业和城市生活打造一个另类选择。一个与自然、自己和他人更紧密联系的选择。探索全球30多个地方，在那里你可以和志同道合的远程工作者一起生活、工作和冲浪。因为生活就是现在。Pier🌺️ 🌺️
localize.tagline: 栖息地和邻近冲浪的社区💻🌊。

localize.description: 讓我們爲傳統的職業和城市生活打造一個另類選擇。一個與自然、自己和他人更緊密聯繫的選擇。探索全球30多個地方，在那裏你可以和志同道合的遠程工作者一起生活、工作和衝浪。因爲生活就是現在。Pier🌺️ 🌺️
localize.tagline: 棲息地和鄰近衝浪的社區💻🌊。

previous.excerpt: Job Description is an AI-based service utilising GPT-3 to generate high-quality professional job descriptions for businesses attracting the best talent. Generate professional job descriptions in seconds. No previous writing experience required.
previous.title: Job Description AI - Create professional job descriptions in seconds using AI

localize.description: 职位描述是一个基于人工智能的服务，利用GPT-3生成高质量的专业职位描述，为企业吸引优秀人才。几秒钟就能生成专业的职位描述。无需以往的写作经验。
localize.tagline: 使用AI在几秒钟内创建专业的工作描述

localize.description: 職位描述是一個基於人工智能的服務，利用GPT-3生成高質量的專業職位描述，爲企業吸引優秀人才。幾秒鐘就能生成專業的職位描述。無需以往的寫作經驗。
localize.tagline: 使用AI在幾秒鐘內創建專業的工作描述

next.excerpt: Codeprints offers geeky wall art for nerds and developers. You can create a personalized print of your GitHub contributions to motivate you every day. A service created for developers by developers.
next.title: Codeprints - Your code is art - git contributions on your wall

localize.description: Codeprints为书呆子和开发者提供极客墙艺。你可以为你的GitHub贡献创建一个个性化的打印，以激励你每天。一个由开发者为开发者创建的服务。
localize.tagline: 你的代码就是艺术--git贡献在你的墙上。

localize.description: Codeprints爲書呆子和開發者提供極客牆藝。你可以爲你的GitHub貢獻創建一個個性化的打印，以激勵你每天。一個由開發者爲開發者創建的服務。
localize.tagline: 你的代碼就是藝術--git貢獻在你的牆上。
